mapper.select: SELECT A.ID AS COMMENT_ID , A.POST_ID AS POST_ID , A.PARENT_ID AS PARENT_ID , A.CONTENT AS COMMENT_CONTENT , B.NICKNAME AS MEMBER_NICKNAME , C.NAME AS RANK_NAME , A.CREATED_AT AS CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT AS UPDATED_AT FROM STUDY_RECRUIT_COMMENT A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.ID JOIN MEMBER_RANK C ON B.RANK_ID = C.ID WHERE A.POST_ID = #{postId} AND A.VISIBILITY = 'Y' ORDER BY A.PARENT_ID ASC, A.ID ASC
